Articles.Content: Should I reattach the parts? Is there a mod to be able to fix the ship? Should I edit the parts? Any hope for this ship? Was kind of hoping to use it, took forever to make it
It's bending because you're pushing the load rather than pulling, and you're using small docking ports.

The bending is visible but otherwise the ship is mostly black and I don't see clearly what is it made of.

I would guess the problem is that it's bending under torque. Switching off the thrust and going to time warp for a moment might help getting it straight.

Regarding what could be done so it doesn't bend so much, I'd need to see the ship construction in better detail.
Try Kerbal Joint Reinforcement, it may help.

When using docking ports to connect different parts of a ship, you need to pull it, not push it.

What's happening to your ship is a combination of the weakness of docking ports and a lack of rigidity, ie, struts. Even if you replace any docking port connected areas of the ship, without struts your craft will still wobble because of how long and skinny it is.
Wouldn't it be great if kerbals on EVA could add struts?

If you're doing this with docking ports and you want to use struts, there is a quantum strut mod available. Although I haven't tried it myself so I can't say how well it works. You can turn them on after docking and I think there's a power draw to keep them active.

Wouldn't it be great if kerbals on EVA could add struts?

A tip; If you want to tow the craft, set the engines on outriggers. Slap a fuel tank on a girder, engine on the bottom, and run fuel lines out from the main tank.

KJR helps with Joint Strength, from the design it's not going to help much (But it's good to have anyway) KAS is probably the way to go to add struts, but depending on how much force your engines are putting out they may break. Pulling is highly recommended if you are using the small docking ports, but the Mun and Minmus have enough science between them to unlock the large ones in a few missions.
true, I am making this massive ship to get to the mun lol. I have been there a few times but this is more fun
